I also agree to comply with the {0}, the {1} and the {2} of Mekyal Financial Technologies which are placed on this Platform and all updates thereto. Furthermore, I acknowledge that Mekyal Financial Technologies Company did not provide any investment advices or recommendations regarding this offered opportunity.
Client_Ack_2: I acknowldge I am aware of the high risks associated with the transactions on this Platform and I am willing to accept such risks, and I know that the crowdfunding offers placed on this website are risky in nature and involve the risk of loss of the entire investment. I am aware that the securities sold through private subscriptions and crowdfunding shall not be placed for public trading, and that there shall be no assurance that the assessment presented for the opportunities is accurate or conforms with the assessments made by the market or the industry.
Client_Ack_3: I acknowldge that the shares which I shall obtain may be restricted and are subject to the holding period requirements as stipulated by the laws enforced in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. I also acknowledge that investing in the crowdfunding requires high risk taking and inability to liquidate the investments as well as long term obligations.
Client_Ack_4: I acknowldge I am aware that neither the Capital Market Authority nor any government or regulatory commission have recommended or approved any investment or any accuracy or completeness of any of the information or materials presented through the Platform of Mekyal Financial Technologies.
Client_Ack_5: I acknowldge I have read the prospectus associated with this opportunity as well as the  information presented by the Platform on such opportunity and the risks associated with the investment in it and I agreed to it.
Client_Ack_6: I acknowldge I am fully aware that the overshight of the Capital Market Authority over the Platform of Mekyal Financial Technologies is limited only to the issues where the legal form of the issuer is a joint stock company according to the classification set forth in the Companies Law of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
Client_Ack_7: I acknowldge that by selecting the “Invest Now” icon, I shall not have the right to withdraw my decision of investmeing in this opportunity.

Investor_KYC_Qualification_Criteria_1: Has conducted transactions in security markets of not less than 40 million Saudi riyals in total, and not less than ten transactions in each quarter during the last twelve months.
Investor_KYC_Qualification_Criteria_2: Has net assets is not less than 5 million Saudi Riyals.
Investor_KYC_Qualification_Criteria_3: Holds the General Securities Qualification Certificate which is recognized by the Authority.
Investor_KYC_Qualification_Criteria_4: Works or has worked for at least three years in the financial sector.
Investor_KYC_Qualification_Criteria_5: Hold professional certificate that is related to securities business and accredited by an internationally recognized entity.
Investor_KYC_Qualification_Criteria_6: Non-resident foreigners permitted to invest in parallel market and who meet the requirements stipulated in the Guidance Note for the investment of Non-Resident Foreigners in parallel Market.
